entry.title: New release for Postiz: New Concept: 3rd party integrations
entry.content:
We now have a completely new page called integrations. It allows you to connect Postiz with external services to: Generate video/pictures, send webhooks, etc. The first integration is up: HeyGen - you can convert your post into a video of you talking! pretty neat :) If you have a SaaS, feel free to add it as an integration. Docs will be uploaded soon!

What's Changed

  • Add Integrations by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/833 Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.53.0...v1.54.0
